review:
** ** * ***** *** 
He has operated me for ligament tear(ACL Reconstruction and my mom for hip replacement.He is very kind and listen to patient very patiently. He has much patience to handle all the fears of patients and support them.Its more than 5 years of treatment and I don't have any issue.I strongly recommend the Dr.

Hi Dr. Krishnamoorthy Sir!
Thank you for the most wonderful treatment for
My Mother!

We will truly admire the person that you are and the doctor in you is honorable.

The brilliant treatment deserve immense thanks and appreciation.

Sending over our most humble and heartfelt thanks for your immense care and comfort for the treatment..

The most flexible and down to earth Doctor we came across in life...

THANK YOU DOCTOR!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited Dr. Krishnamoorthy for Back Pain caused due to a minor accident.  I was suggested to go for operation in an other hospital.  Then i visited Dr.  He spent close to 30 minutes during consultation asked so many questions about nature of job, hobbies, travel, sports activities, habits etc. Later Dr suggested that operation is not required for my life style and suggested physiotheraphy and exercises.  I am doing  fine for the past five years.
No words to praise him. *** ** *** **** ****** ** *****. Today my mom is walking perfectly because of him.
He is the best.. Courteous and always approaches the patients with a smile.. Which Heals the patient physiologically.. I would recommend Dr. Krishnamoorthy to anyone who needs an Ortho's help..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
